message.content:
cs.GR, cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.HC, cs.AI. 

The paper presents a data-driven approach for designing garments using sketching and estimating garment and body shape parameters. This involves techniques from computer graphics (cs.GR) for simulating garment draping, computer vision (cs.CV) for estimating body shape parameters, multimedia (cs.MM) for handling multimodal input, human-computer interaction (cs.HC) for designing user-friendly workflows, and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) for learning a shared shape space. Therefore, these are the most likely sub-categories for this paper.
